features: Unique 1.96 inch dial: Carry everything from fitness tracking to smart notifications on your wrist with the CMF Watch Pro. The expansive 1.96" AMOLED display allows you to see information more clearly. You can also customize the watch dial according to your preferences in the CMF watch application, including dynamic and static choices as well as 8 always-on options.

Unmatched call clarity: CMF smart watche has AI noise reduction bluetooth call function and supports up to 18 hours of continuous Bluetooth calls. Make your calls with family and friends smoother and clearer. The watch can achieve an ultra long battery life of 45 days (power saving mode), with a typical mode lasting up to 13 days.

Your sports partner: From yoga to running, 110 different exercise modes cover your various exercise scenarios. IP68 waterproof grade can fully meet your daily use. The built-in GPS supports 5 types of satellite positioning systems, allowing you to accurately know your movement trajectory and distance data.

Caring Health Assistant: This multifunctional fitness tracker provides multiple functions to safeguard your health, including testing heart rate, blood oxygen saturation, water reminder, stress test, sleep monitoring, standing reminder, and breathing training, allowing you to enjoy every day with vitality.

More features waiting for you to explore: In addition to being your sports and health assistant, our CMF watch is also a small assistant for your daily life. The watch also includes various functions such as mobile music control, timer, stopwatch, alarm clock, weather, find my phone, flashlight, remote camera control, and more surprises waiting for you to discover.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BIG SCREEN POTENTIAL More than just timekeeping. Carry everything from fitness tracking to smart notifications on your wrist with the CMF Watch Pro. The expansive 1.96" AMOLED display magnifies your information through ultra smooth touch-responsive interactions. All it takes is a tap. BLUETOOTH CALLS WITH AI NOISE REDUCTION Touch base with family and friends via the integrated microphone and speaker. It uses AI technology that's been trained on 100,000+ noise models – for unparalleled call clarity.

MAKE MOVEMENT MATTER Beat your personal best with the stats you need. Get thelowdown on your reps duration, calories, heart rate, pace.steps and distance to reach new fitness heights. CUSTOMISED WATCH DIALS Switch between dozens of watch dials via the CMF Watch app. With dynamic and static choices as well as 8 always-on options. Or customise the backdrop with your favourite photographs. Our signature dot matrix style keeps things looking sleek. BUILT-IN MULTI-SYSTEM GPS Go places, with built-in GPS. With support for 5 satellite positioning systems, you can effortlessly obtain accurate trace and distance data for activities such as running, cycling, walking and hiking.

ALL-ROUND HEALTH MONITOR HEART RATE MONITOR: Track your heart rate 24 hours a day. Take control with manual measurements if needed.BLOOD OXYGENSATURATION(SpO2)MONITOR: Your very own portable blood oxygen saturation monitor.WATER REMINDER: More of what's essential. Get your regular hydration boostthanks to our water reminder.STRESS MONITOR: Manage your stress levels by being aware of when you are relaxed or experiencing high levels of stress throughout the day.SLEEP MONITOR: Boost your sleep with comprehensive tracking. STAND UPREMINDER: Break up your sitting time with stretches and steps around theroom thanks to our stand up reminder.BREATH TRAINING: A reminder to be zen. Our guided breath exercises will help youfind your middle again.

OTHER FEATURES Bluetooth call, Cloud watch dials, photo album dials, breathing training, message notification, phone music control, timer, stopwatch, alarms, weather, find my phone, flashlight, remote camera controlMicrophone: SupportedSpeaker: SupportedWater & Dust Resistance Rating: IP68
SEAMLESS FROM WATCH TO APP Bluetooth version: Bluetooth 5.3Compatibility: Supports iOS 13 and above, Android 8.0 and above

FAQ about CMF BY NOTHING WATCH PRO 1.Which system languages are available on Watch Pro? The system on Watch Pro is available in English, Spanish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, French, Korean, Russian, Portuguese, German, Italian, Hindi, Indonesian, and Japanese. 2.Does Watch Pro support NFC? Watch Pro does not support NFC functionality. 3.Does Watch Pro support Bluetooth calls? Yes, Watch Pro can make and receive calls using Bluetooth. It is necessary to pair Watch Pro with a phone first. 4.Does Watch Pro support eSIM service? Watch Pro does not support eSIM service. 5.How do I customize the watch face? Once you have paired your Watch Pro with the CMF Watch app, you can access the Watch Face marketplace in the app. In the My tab, select Customize Watch Face. Choose a background and style for your watch face, then download it. Your watch will now display the customized watch face. 6.Does Watch Pro support auto-brightness adjustment based on ambient light? No, it does not.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Way too big
reviews.reviewText: This watch is almost as large as an Apple Watch Ultra. The watch itself is nice with great features but it wouldn't fit under a dress shirt sleeve. I returned it and still haven't gotten my refund.If CMF/Nothing produces a smaller watch in the future I will def purchase it. Love the tank style though, don't change it. My Pixel watch willhave to do until then.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Constantly disconnecting from Smartphone and GPS tracking is broken.
reviews.reviewText: I really like the design and feel of the watch:- very good quality for the price.- really beautiful design and screen.The deal-breaking issues are:1. It continuously disconnect from the phone (Android), so you don't receive the notifications (one of the main uses I have for a smartwatch).2. No tracking data on the app: stress, sleep ... everything worked ok the first day, and then ... zero. But in the watch I see the info is registered!3. GPS data on the app: It looks like I walk in the middle of the sea on every activity, even though I always wait for the GPS to catch its location before starting.I update the watch and the app, but the problems persist, so I went back to my trustable Garmin.Until they fix (at least) the disconnect from phone issue, I can't come back. Sad, because the shape, size and screen quality is really excelent.
"Nothing" fancy, just the stuff that you need, basic trackers, good battery and screen... No gimmicks. Build quality is on point.

Muy contento, se empareja perfectamente con el teléfono, nunca se desconecta, la batería dura muchísimo, aunque no podría decir cuanto con el pulso, agua, estrés etc 24/7 ya que yo solo lo uso como reloj y leer notificaciones de diario, y activo la opción de trackeo con el deporte ( 4 veces a la semana). GPS siempre activo.Calidad de llamada correcta.Bonito, se ve solido, buenas opciones. Por ponerle una pega, que no tiene NFC, pero por este precio es algo logico.

reviews.reviewTitle: Il Design unico di Nothing e CMF
reviews.reviewText: Premetto che ho acquistato questo orologio principalmente attratto dal suo aspetto estetico e dal design. Sono un utente Apple e utilizzo quotidianamente un Apple Watch. Devo dire che, dal giorno dell'acquisto, ho testato questo prodotto e lo trovo davvero eccellente. È bello (anche il packaging è uno spettacolo), elegante e leggero. Una volta indossato al polso, lo dimenticherete persino. Ho anche notato che il vetro resiste molto bene alle impronte digitali, molto meglio rispetto all'Apple Watch.Questo orologio funziona in coppia con la sua app dedicata e permette di misurare il battito cardiaco, la saturazione del sangue e il livello di stress. Inoltre, offre una modalità sport con vari allenamenti simili a iOS. L'app stessa è minimalista, ma contiene tutte le funzioni essenziali e funziona in modo eccellente.Le diverse "faces" dell'orologio devono essere scaricate e installate ogni volta dall'app, e alcune di esse potrebbero essere di difficile lettura. Tuttavia, tutte sono caratterizzate da un design straordinario. Onestamente, il passaggio da un dispositivo Apple può risultare un po' complicato a causa della mancanza di Siri e di alcune altre funzionalità. Tuttavia, per gli utenti Android, ritengo che questo orologio sia un must-have, considerando il suo rapporto qualità-prezzo. Inoltre, porterete a casa un oggetto di design puro.Un plauso a "Nothing" e a "CMF" che ci deliziano con prodotti dal design unico ed inconfondibile.

Per il prezzo il prodotto é veramente ottimo, dimensioni giuste si configura in un attimo le notifiche sono precise, la batteria sembra durare abbastanza, il sistema operativo é molto veloce e ha alcune funzionalità normalmente a pannaggio di smartwatch ben più costosi. Ha due difetti ovvero che non notifica il chiamante per nome e che lo schermo reale é sensibilmente più piccolo della cornice.EDIT: Il problema del nome del chiamante è stato risolto.

Ich wollte die Uhr unbedingt haben, seitdem ich erfahren habe das Nothing/CMF die Uhr produzieren wird.Jetzt besitze ich sie, und bin extrem beeindruckt.Note Design: 1-Das Design ist schlicht und einfach, Modern.. ein Hingucker (für mich).Das Gummiarmband ist Okay und angenehm, jedoch empfehle ich trotzdem auf ein anderes Band zu wechseln, da es auf dauer sehr unangenehm werden kann.Telefonieren... Funktionalität: 1+Ich telefoniere regelmäßig mit der. Ich Frage regelmäßig die Personen auf der anderen Seite des Telefonats wie ich mich anhöre, ob es einen Unterschied zu sonst gibt.. und es wird immer Positives erwähnt. Mikrofon und Lautsprecher sind Top, für Leute die mit der Uhr Telefonieren möchten empfehle ich sie sehr.Note OS: 3-Das Cmf OS ist auf jeden Fall noch Ausbaufähig, hier und da gibt es noch einige Bugs, sowie das Benachrichtigungen nicht richtig angezeigt werden, oder erst garnicht ankommen auf der Uhr, trotz das die jeweilige Funktion aktiviert ist in der Cmf App. Neben Features wie Herzfrequenz, Puls, Stress, Schlafen etc. Funktionieren ohne Probleme, jedoch könnte man hier und da noch einwenig an den Anzeigen der App und der Uhr arbeiten.Im allgemeinen bin ich zufrieden mit dem Overlay der Uhr, mit hier und da einpaar "Problemchen", die hoffentlich in den nächsten Zeiten behoben werden. Die Uhr selber ist Übersichtlich, Kachels werden richtig angezeigt und auch so detailliert beschrieben, das jeder weiß was die Uhr von jemanden möchte. Auch die Auswahl an Ziffernblättern ist gut. (Man kann sich auch selber welche erstellen, mit eigenen Bildern von der Familie zum Beispiel)Note Akku: 1-Der Akku läuft einwandfrei.Mit maximaler Benutzung schafft der Akku der Uhr locker 4 - 5 Tage. Nach einmal Aufladen auf 100% habe ich innerhalb von 5 Tagen mit zwischendurch Telefonieren immernoch 70% Akku.Insgesamt ist die Uhr super, aber wie immer ist das meine eigene Meinung. Jeder sollte sich selber ein Bild von der Uhr machen. Müsst ihr wissen. 😊
